# Context

[Positron](https://positron.posit.co/) is a sharp tool to conduct data analytics workflows. Essentially, it is a fancy and multi-functional text editor that allow users to work with codes highly productively. You might have heard of such category of tools called as "IDE" (Integrated Development Environment). 

Positron is designed to maximize productivity R and Python users who write command lines for data analyses and workflows.

Positron is made and maintained by a group of dedicated data science professionals at a non-for-profit company called [Posit](https://posit.co/), an open-source data science company. The tool is completely free to use.

Since Positron plays well with both R and Python, we will prioritize using it for our education series here.
